name: Spinach Balls
recipeIngredient: 1 pkg frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained (10 ounce)
2 Cups finely crushed herb - seasoned dry bread stuffing mix

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

In a large bowl combine spinach, stuffing mix, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, black pepper, Italian seasoning, melted butter and eggs and onions. Shape into walnut-sized balls and place on a baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until heated through and browned.
